title: The Baby Factory
description: "The Baby Factory" - Put yourself in Meghan and Sarah's place; jailed on false charges and sent to a women's prison that is a facade for a working baby factory. Would you have what it takes to survive the cruel treatment of the warden and her guards and the survival instinct to find a way out of a successfully run fifteen year business? How do they impregnate the girls and what happens to the ones who don't produce offspring? Do the girls fight and survive, or does the warden win again? The Baby Factory is a suspense novel that is available on Amazon.com in print and on Kindle.
author: Donna Walo Clancy
